Package model

Class BluetoothWrapper

java.lang.Object
model.BluetoothWrapper
public class BluetoothWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
A Bluetooth Wrapper used to wrap some features of the bluetooth communicator of the Decision Team.
Author:
TRAFNY Theo - UPSSITECH

    • sendData

      public static void sendData​(commande.CommandeParams commande, long wait)
      Send a command to the robot, but if another command has been sent 'wait' (milliseconds) ago, the command will not be sent.
      Parameters:
      commande - The command to send.
      wait - The interval between two send.
